data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Kalimantan Barat words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kalimantan Barat, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Kalimantan Barat, Indonesia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Kalimantan Barat, Indonesia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kalimantan Barat, Indonesia. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Sanggau-Sekadau people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, let those from the 141,042 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Kalimantan Barat to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Kalimantan Barat, Indonesia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.
